errors.contract-not-found: No contract file found at {filePath} on branch {branchName}

create-configuration-form.title: Set up configuration for {repositoryName}
create-configuration-form.name-field-placeholder: Give a name to your {repositoryName} configuration
create-configuration-form.config-contract-file-path-field-label: Path to your configuration contract file
create-configuration-form.branch-field-placeholder: On which branch should we find the file?
create-configuration-form.contract-help-message: Need help defining your contract? Follow documentation

errors.empty-name: You must provide a name for your configuration

delete.title: Delete this configuration
delete.message: Once you delete an configuration, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {configurationName} configuration, its environments, configuration values and its api keys.
confirm.button-label: I understand the consequences, delete this configuration

errors.empty-name: You must provide a name for your environment

api-keys.title: API Keys
api-keys.message: API Keys are unique to an environment. An API key is required to fetch your configuration from your application running environment.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete this api key?
confirm.message: Any applications or scripts using the "{key}" key will no longer be able to access this environment values. You cannot undo this action..
confirm.button-label: I understand, delete this api key

delete.title: Delete this environment
delete.message: Once you delete an environment, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {environmentName} environment, its configuration values and its api keys.
confirm.button-label: I understand the consequences, delete this environment

errors.unknown: An unknown error happened. Please try again later.
